Keywords: Animal , Gorilla City , Ruler
Real Name: Tolifhar
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Captain
MOVEMENT: Elevated
MIGHT I SUGGEST AN ALLIANCE?: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Gorilla City keyword gain the Amazon keyword.
FOR A NEW CAUSE: Friendly Sidekicks can use Sidestep.
LEADER OF THE GORILLA KNIGHTS: Leadership. When Tolifhar uses it and succeeds, you may instead generate a WW80 #007 Gorilla Knight on click #1.

Comments
August 29, 2021
Dortmuner
Those gorilla knights are ridiculous for their cost, especially if they're being generated for free. Swinging with an 11 for three points of damage. If you play them with Grodd they're swinging with a 12. With Tolifhar they have sidestep. It's easy to give them cheap ESD or Combat Reflexes for a Defense of 20 or more. And four clicks plus toughness means they're resistant to being one-shotted. If he was getting that lucky with his leadership rolls, it's no wonder you got beat.
August 29, 2021
Kite-Man
Played against him the other day in a 200 point game. He rolled his leadership 5 times in a row to start the game, adding 100 extra points worth of Gorillas to his team right off the bat. He added many more Gorillas throughout the course of the game until he had an additional 200 points worth of figures on the map. I lost the game very badly.
